title: Im offically quitting Because riot doesnt know how to help players out.
body: I neeed help for 4 days now.. no response.. I wrote 4 articles.. and still no help. Riot your trash. Learn to accommodate your gamers. Ive spent well over 1000$ on this game..  My fps dropped after update I cant even play no more.  Then yall ban my main because of me lagging out of games.. so officially I give yall a terrible review. MMOHUT employee

replies.body: dude you just gotta be patient. You know how many peeps come in here with problems? hundreds, daily. I'm pretty sure they'll help you out as soon as they can. just make a ticket and and just wait patiently brah.

wrote 4 arcticles? i reeeally hope you meant tickets, because if they are not then you basically deserved that. They do sometimes answer posts because people gets swamped there, but the proper way to contact them with this kind of problems is by ticket.
They also choose to answer a few little petty posts rather than the needs of players, as seen by the 0 red in the hot section

FPS issues after Windows updates is most likely caused by a feature that was enabled called *Game DVR*. You can disable this feature by turning off the Windows Game Bar using [this guide.](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html)

Let me know if that resolved the issue or caused any change.
